official_title: A bill to amend section 8905(e) of title 5, United States Code, to require the Office of Personnel Management to provide Federal employees and annuitants with an opportunity to transfer enrollments between health benefits plans whenever an adjustment is made in the rates charged or the benefits provided under any such plan and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Office of Personnel Management to provide employees and annuitants an opportunity to transfer or cancel enrollment in a health benefits plan whenever an adjustment is made in the plan's rates or benefits. Directs the Office to provide an annual opportunity to transfer or cancel enrollments notwithstanding any other such opportunities required because of changes in rates or benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8905(e) of title 5, United States Code, to require the Office of Personnel Management to provide Federal employees and annuitants with an opportunity to transfer enrollments between health benefits plans whenever an adjustment is made in the rates charged or the benefits provided under any such plan and for other purposes.
